title: Virtua tennis 3 PC-DVD
description:
Game info:

Virtua Tennis returns with enhanced, photo-realistic graphics and advanced player animations that perfectly match the behavior and 

mannerisms of individual professional athletes. Improvements to the game's AI have also upped the challenge to becoming the top 

seed of the tennis world.

In Career Mode, gamers will travel the world and take on the biggest stars of the tennis world. Improvements to the Player 

Creation Mode allow gamers to customize their own tennis star with a wealth of licensed tennis equipment and increased detail like 

never before. And, in addition to the popular mini-games from previous titles used to sharpen players' skills, there are a whole 

host of brand new challenges to keep players in top form.

Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish

Minimum Spec:
1-4 Players
Windows 2000/XP/XP64
2 Ghz Processor
512 MB RAM Memory
Video card - ATI Radeon 9600 or higher / Nvidia Geforce FX 5900 or higher


Official Website:http://www.sega.co.uk/

Size:2.44 GB
Protection:Safedisc 4.60.000

Installation:

*Burn/mount iso
*Install
*Copy vt3.exe located in crack-folder on dvd to your install directory
*Enjoy some great tennis!
